column3: “this is making me want to make a list of fun and easy things to do if you are home alone. the only problem is my hands can't type on my phone that good right now so I have to voice text the list. The first thing is put makeup on and put music on in the background and it feels like you're living in the time that the song is playing. I know this probably doesn't make much sense to you reading this but it totally does t...”

“A beautiful child has been born of Space Queen and Blue Dream. Enjoyed in an O. Pen vape concentrate and liking equally to flower consumtion method. Verrry spacey unfocused fun with dreamy  floaty starborn effects. Anxiety Blaster! Pain Zapper!...Rest Assured Munchy Magic...kick back and watch the passing parade...Peace✌ Jah ❤”

“I have to say this has been one of my favorite strains so far. The other reviews I saw were pretty accurate.

This helped immensely with depression, stress, and replaced that nonsense with a clear, focused, happy high. I enjoyed music a lot more, I wanted to spend more time hugging my pets. 

Could probably sleep if I needed to -- but this by itself made me want to just enjoy spending time with my wife and experi...”

“I have been vomiting all night from food poisoning. Towards morning I remembered that I had purchased Dream Queen specifically to have on  hand for nausea. It has done the trick! No vomiting... just smoke it when I *start* to feel queasy. A specific need, a specific med.”
“🍍..O.Pen Reserve 420 Vape: Makes me feel like a SPACE QUEEN🚀..Luv the Brain massage, dig the Body melt..0 Pain or Stress now!..Etherical, Euohoric..🎵Grooovinnn' on a Sunday afternoon
column4: Feeelinn' like "🎶..Kickin' Back & watchin' the Passing Parade of Life..No PTSD with this girl!..& PAIN?..what Pain!  FATIGUE?..I have Tons of Physical & Mentle Energy! 🏋...DQ in O.Pen Vape is going to the top of my FAV list. Cool

column3: “I don't believe a 10" exists
column4: but this is pretty damn close. PERFECT for depression. Functional
column5: uplifting with the right amount of goofyness thrown in. Really puts a positive spin on your day
column6: helps the hunger and you will be able to sleep at night. Best of all worlds. Blue Dream
column7: Sour D & Skywalker sometimes go this route
column8: but this is a very reliable strain (when grown proper). One of my top 3 of all time.”"

column3:
“This is quickly becoming a great morning smoke; the high doesn't last as long as I would like but the benefits during are really nice. I find that a couple snaps of this and I am in an incredible mood. It kills my appetite which I actually enjoy in the mornings. 
Definitely makes me a space cadet if I smoke too much of it though. I find that I feel out of my own mind, just at peace within my own head (this just sound...”
“I don't get high off bud very often... But when I do, it's because of Dream Queen. That stuff is fire!!!!”
“Wife loves this one.  It's her go to sex weed and menstral cramps.”

“My new favorite. Headache gone. Dry mouth. Aroused, touch feels better. Able to think very clearly and relaxed. Some back pain/pressure. Helped me find interest in studying, I enjoyed studying medical information on this and putting together concepts. More relaxed. Great for reading. Dry eyes. Kind of jittery, but it's okay because it helps me focus and I'm naturally a jitterer (is that a word?). Good for depression ...”

“This weed when broken up smells not very pungent but more flowery. When smoked the flavor is a harsh earthy flavor with a hint of sugar in the aftertaste. the high is very cerebral feeling and sativa like. great high for just general enjoyment. quiet euphoric feeling, but doesnt last as long as id like it to”

“Finally a bud that I’m excited about! This is the first bud in months that reminds me of the Blue Dream I missed out on. The smell of this bud is like cotton candy. It’s so sweet, smooth to hit, and has very frosty leaves. This is definitely going to be my “wake and bake” bud, definitely a sativa heavy bud.  All I have to say is that the Dream Queen is going to go down in my books as one of the best hybrid strains I'...”

“This strain has a very nice smell to it. Not skunky, but more like fresh field flowers. The effects when smoking set in gradually easing into a very relaxed state. 
It is important to note that after smoking this particular strain the effects don't deteriorate as quickly as with other strains. A few good hits and the mellow dream like feeling stays with you for hours. 
I remember smoking with friends and watching a m...”

“This was the epitome of the scientific manipulation in weed. I am a heavy smoker and of all the strains I have been fortunate enough to try Dream queen is the best. Two hits off my shitty little spoon and I was in fucking space. Buy this stuff.”

“Ahh Dream Queen -- delivered to my High Life sided by the heavyweight Mango Trainwreck and the giggly newcomer, Querkle. 

Colored overwhelmingly in the light green hue of famous images of weed, it has spots of truly green leaves, a fair mass of hairy orange patches, but no purple dank. Nonetheless, trichome coverage is superb.

The first smoke out of a bowl leaves a slight semi-frosty layer on the middle of the ...”

“Back in my day we would have called this creeper" bud because its potency creeps up on you slowly. But then it gets you from the base of your skull and makes your nerve endings stop feeling so electrified. It was a perfect balance between the body and the mind. Before Dream Queen gives your brain a hug you do taste its fragrant goodness
column4: very smooth. I learned though that I take smaller puffs and hold it in longer i...”"

column3: “Nice relaxing uplifting strain. No couch lock and good for depression pain and anxiety. Tastes sweet and smells pungent.”
“Dank. Super dreamy. It has an incredible high and is good for sleeping. I like to just relax with a bowl of Dream Queen and take it easy. Good for a lazy day off. Tasty and Earthy.”
“Always look for Dream Queen.  Happy, energetic, head high.  Good on pain.”

“This strain works wonderfully for my depression. It definitely lifts your spirits. However, as a pain reliever it leaves much to be desired. My leg pain was still noticeable after smoking this. I didn't mind the pain as much, however.”
“Very relaxing.Long high.Recommend if ur looking forward to a chilled out day.”
“Really nice, pleasant, competent, clear-headed high. A great daily strain, not a superfun blowout, but more calm, lightly energetic. Rather talky.”

“For me, a perfect mix of sativa soaring, happy and euphoric effect with a nice relaxer from the 30% indica, but not a downer. Great to vape in a MFLB. Amazing smell, nice taste. Haven't found anyone who doesn't like this strain. 

Felt zero paranoia, after weeks of use. The only negative if you want to call it that is you build up a tolerance after a few weeks. Try something else a few days, and it comes right back...”

“I was enthralled by the delicious smell of this strain. The taste reminded me of a sweet candy with a tinge of citrus. I smoked a small bowl (about 3-4 hits) of a spoon pipe and was thoroughly ripped. This strain is a slight creeper and will hit you cerebrally at first, with a heavy, sleepy body high coming later.”

“This strain works wonderfully for my depression. It definitely lifts your spirits. However, as a pain reliever it leaves much to be desired. My leg pain was still noticeable after smoking this. I didn't mind the pain as much, however.”
“it brings me high quality dreams and makes me realise the real difference between the dream and reality.frankly I can control those dreams.”
“Nice relaxing uplifting strain. No couch lock and good for depression pain and anxiety. Tastes sweet and smells pungent.”

“For me, a perfect mix of sativa soaring, happy and euphoric effect with a nice relaxer from the 30% indica, but not a downer. Great to vape in a MFLB. Amazing smell, nice taste. Haven't found anyone who doesn't like this strain. 

Felt zero paranoia, after weeks of use. The only negative if you want to call it that is you build up a tolerance after a few weeks. Try something else a few days, and it comes right back...”
“Always look for Dream Queen.  Happy, energetic, head high.  Good on pain.”
“Dank. Super dreamy. It has an incredible high and is good for sleeping. I like to just relax with a bowl of Dream Queen and take it easy. Good for a lazy day off. Tasty and Earthy.”

“What an awesome strain.  I was feeling down in the dumps after a long day of work and then along came the Dream Queen and lightened everything up for me.  It was an attitude adjustment in a positive direction.  Worth trying!”

“Had a huge mental breakdown and felt iffy with a killer headache after so i smoke a bowl of ground Dream queen and my body is numb and emotionally i fell better may have snoked too much bc in about to sleep and my body is floating haha this shit is 🔥🔥”

“Had a huge mental breakdown and felt iffy with a killer headache after so i smoke a bowl of ground Dream queen and my body is numb and emotionally i fell better may have snoked too much bc in about to sleep and my body is floating haha this shit is 🔥🔥”
“Nice and relaxing. extremely helpful for Lupus and insomnia. I have both.”

“Love this strand, got me nice lifted. I suffer from depression & anxiety. This strand help me get out of a black hole I was in. Couple of tokes, and some good music and I was strutting down the blvd like I was shooting a music video!”

“This had me in a deep trance, sleeping with my eyes open. Perfect for sitting outside on a hot and humid summer night and just listening to the frogs and buzzing insects. Getting up from my seat and moving about my home for menial chores (bathroom, going to the fridge etc) proved to be fairly difficult as I felt rather disoriented and a tad wobbly every time I stood up. I had to walk the dog and would've gotten lost ...”

“One of the most appropriately named strains I've encountered! This weed tricks you with an initial burst of energy. After that, prepare to be hypnotized. An instant cure for insomnia, a binge of Dream Queen once put me away for 16 hours in a row (for much needed sleep). Keep on standby for sleepless nights, middle of the night restlessness, or for quick schedule adjustments. Use with caution! This weed will leave you...”

“This strain was absolutely amazing I have pains in my knees neck hands and back it takes all that away also form my stoner side one bowl has me blitzed I love the taste the smell the feel that high is wonderful and last fairly long I would def get again”
“One thing I'll say is that the high doesn't last as long as others. Otherwise, great strain.”
“Really nice smell and taste. Didn't cough much, and I cough ALL THE TIME. Fun and very social high.”

“This strain was absolutely amazing I have pains in my knees neck hands and back it takes all that away also form my stoner side one bowl has me blitzed I love the taste the smell the feel that high is wonderful and last fairly long I would def get again”
“Really nice smell and taste. Didn't cough much, and I cough ALL THE TIME. Fun and very social high.”
“This is my most favorite week - hands down! I thought I was an Indica smoker till I gave this strain a try. If it stays on sale forever would make this chicka a very, very happy person.”
“Never have I ever had a higher..no pun intended...euphoric hiatus. Bring to the beach. You’re welcome”

“Energetic, focused and surprisingly cerebral. Most significantly, I experienced the high as an instant (positive) attitude adjustor, complete w early-on light butterfly sensations around the abdomen. A good high, lasting the better part of 2hrs w consistency and not that tapered down effect of lesser strains.  In short - we love it.”

“dense nugs decent smell. Description is true I smoked a lot of it and it felt like I wasnt attached to my body and was in a dream. However this is one of those strains that just make you feel super dumb and unfunctional. There are a lot of social strains I prefer over this that feel more euphoric and creative. For some one who wants to get super fkd up this is a good buy for some one who wants a nice pick me up bowl ...”

“Absolutely worth whatever the price is this stuff is awesome!! When you think of a perfect state of being this flower definitely gets you there. The smell is amazing and the taste as well. Definitely one of my top ten.”

“From a 3 foot bag of 1/2 gram in the vaporizer; listed are each temperature a bag was pulled:

370 degrees – Mellow vapor; not thick, pine and cheese smells (good ones).

380 degrees – Thicker vapor, sip it instead of gulping, you will choke if new to this. Some minor pine smells left. This will hit you, be ready for a 4 (out of ten) if one person (for three people, this will get you all a good buzz, so the super sti...”
“Incredible mouth drying fruity flavors of mango with a unique sweetness that leaves you with a lovely buzz for mind and body.”

“Energetic, focused and surprisingly cerebral. Most significantly, I experienced the high as an instant (positive) attitude adjustor, complete w early-on light butterfly sensations around the abdomen. A good high, lasting the better part of 2hrs w consistency and not that tapered down effect of lesser strains.  In short - we love it.”

“My favorite strand in San Fransico. Definitely help me climb out a of a 2 month long  black hole of depression & anxiety. After a few hits I can make a dope Ass music video! Brought back my creativeness and has me sketching again. I can be smacked and still functional. As weeks of medicating with it, munchies has increased buts that's a given. 
#BloomRoomCollective”

“Cultivated by Poetry & containing 16% THC these firm popcorn buds were lime green with bright orange pistils & fine trichomes which made me uplifted, happy, & relaxed. Tastes & smells were sweet, fruity, earthy, & floral. Dream Queen is a California original that is 70% or more Sativa. If you need a pick me up that is easy going for daytime activities this does the job. Time for me to go be a Dream Queen!!”

“From a 3 foot bag of 1/2 gram in the vaporizer; listed are each temperature a bag was pulled:

370 degrees – Mellow vapor; not thick, pine and cheese smells (good ones).

“Good strain. This’ll get you stoned. Relaxing in small amounts, but can make you a little unfocused and giggly if you smoke a lot.”
“relaxing feel like my legs are floating from my physical body”
“DREAM QUEEN = BLUE DREAM x SPACE QUEEN”

#BloomRoomCollective”
“definitely fruity,  really sweet taste that will bring back for more. really delicious. I think it might be better in papers. cool for adept smokers”

“dense nugs decent smell. Description is true I smoked a lot of it and it felt like I wasnt attached to my body and was in a dream. However this is one of those strains that just make you feel super dumb and unfunctional. There are a lot of social strains I prefer over this that feel more euphoric and creative. For some one who wants to get super fkd up this is a good buy for some one who wants a nice pick me up bowl ...”

“Excellent strain for being super creative & motivated. I can see smoking this on the weekend to get some projects done. 
Mostly happy, a bit giggly and I can still carry on a conversation. 
Not the best for bedtime for me since it’s gives me so much energy. 
Overall decent strain.”

“Absolutely worth whatever the price is this stuff is awesome!! When you think of a perfect state of being this flower definitely gets you there. The smell is amazing and the taste as well. Definitely one of my top ten.”

“Excellent strain for being super creative & motivated. I can see smoking this on the weekend to get some projects done. 
Mostly happy, a bit giggly and I can still carry on a conversation. 
Not the best for bedtime for me since it’s gives me so much energy. 
Overall decent strain.”

#BloomRoomCollective”
“very relaxing high.”

“I picked up an 8th of Dream Queen by Devil's Lettuce from the bargain section at Treehouse Club in Spokane Valley, WA (I'm a sucker for bargains). 

First, I wanna say that I got to try one of its parents, Blue Dream, for the first time the week before; and I would give Blue Dream a 5/5 any day. Let's just say - the sequel did not live up to the hype... 

Dream Queen certainly has a lot of the best of its parents: hi...”

“dense nugs decent smell. Description is true I smoked a lot of it and it felt like I wasnt attached to my body and was in a dream. However this is one of those strains that just make you feel super dumb and unfunctional. There are a lot of social strains I prefer over this that feel more euphoric and creative. For some one who wants to get super fkd up this is a good buy for some one who wants a nice pick me up bowl ...”

“The smell and flavor of this strain is amazing. I found myself constantly smelling this strain even when I was not smoking it. The high from Dream Queen is quite enjoyable. The Sativa is very noticeable as I noticed my brain would start to race" within 5 minutes of smoking. I took a nap after smoking Dream Queen and woke up with a nice little headache
column4: which would be the only reason for not giving 5 stars. Overall

column3:
“My favorite strand in San Fransico. Definitely help me climb out a of a 2 month long  black hole of depression & anxiety. After a few hits I can make a dope Ass music video! Brought back my creativeness and has me sketching again. I can be smacked and still functional. As weeks of medicating with it, munchies has increased buts that's a given. 
#BloomRoomCollective”
“Great for ADD and Depression.   Twice a day has killed my need for Sertraline”
“Honestly love taking this throughout the day this in addition to my Zoloft medication. Together they make the perfect concoction to elevate my PTSD, depression, and anxiety”

“First timer with this hybrid strain, although I have written rave reviews on both blue dream and space queen as two of my favorite go-to strains. The flower is light and fluffy with an amazing aroma both sweet and citrusy. The high is very intense, taking immediate attention after only a couple puffs. While not as racy as I found space queen to be, this strain offers an attractive combination of both focused energy a...”

“Absolutely worth whatever the price is this stuff is awesome!! When you think of a perfect state of being this flower definitely gets you there. The smell is amazing and the taste as well. Definitely one of my top ten.”

“WHOMEVER HAS LIVED IN FLORIDA IN FLORIDA IN THE EARLY 90'S THROUGH 2000'S MOST LIKELY HEARD OF FLORIDA'S HYDRO CRIPPY... 

     TO ME IT ALMOST TASTE AND LOOKS & GIVES YOU THE SAME FEELING AS THE CRIPPY USED TOO...

     I HIGHLY SUGGEST IT.... 

     IT BROUGHT BACK A BUNCH OF GOOD MEMORIES.... 

it's definitely worth trying. It's Super 🔥 TOP SHELF....”

While not as racy as I found space queen to be, this strain offers an attractive combination of both focused energy a...”
“rolled .5g Dream Queen w/ .5g blue dream, by far one of my best highs. super stoney yet able to focus and function. stress and anxiety just fade away.”

“Dream Queen is One of My Favorite. It has a Good Long Lasting EFFect. The feeling I get from smoking it gives me an Uplifting feel like I am not tried But Relaxed. I am Happy. The smell of the strains is Super Delicious 😋. You can't go wrong with this pick.”

“Energetic, focused and surprisingly cerebral. Most significantly, I experienced the high as an instant (positive) attitude adjustor, complete w early-on light butterfly sensations around the abdomen. A good high, lasting the better part of 2hrs w consistency and not that tapered down effect of lesser strains.  In short - we love it.”
“not an amazing strain but ok for mixing and general use, and best for taking a bunch before bed as a knock-out but doesn't always do the job - there are probably better night strains out there.”

“loved it, nice happy high. The body high matches the cerebral and both are pretty intense”

“My favorite strand in San Fransico. Definitely help me climb out a of a 2 month long  black hole of depression & anxiety. After a few hits I can make a dope Ass music video! Brought back my creativeness and has me sketching again. I can be smacked and still functional. As weeks of medicating with it, munchies has increased buts that's a given. 
#BloomRoomCollective”

“Absolutely worth whatever the price is this stuff is awesome!! When you think of a perfect state of being this flower definitely gets you there. The smell is amazing and the taste as well. Definitely one of my top ten.”

“Another great Blue Dream offspring.  It's hard to go wrong with that in the mix, and this hybrid is really nice.  Very cerebral, but not racy.  Not as hazy as BD! But still has a nice spaciness to it.”

“First off let me say I am an indica smoker all the way. Sativas don't usually do much for me.. but this one seems to be the exception. Very mellow, calming, relaxed kinda high.. perfect for stress. It definitely creeps up on you and I was pleasantly surprised by a nice numbing, tingling body high. I'd definitely smoke it again.”
“definitely fruity,  really sweet taste that will bring back for more. really delicious. I think it might be better in papers. cool for adept smokers”
“rolled .5g Dream Queen w/ .5g blue dream, by far one of my best highs. super stoney yet able to focus and function. stress and anxiety just fade away.”
“Great uplifting high. If you have problems with stress or anxiety, or even chronc pain; this is the strain for you. Great tasting bud also, and amazing smell.”
“Outstanding.  Tastes great and just when you think it should wear off you are still dream queening. Love it”
“not much effect, which is nice sometimes.”
“Makes for a nice calm Good evening high, fully equipped to keep you binge watching Elementary" on Hulu   B-)”"

“Took a couple of bong rips. This is the type of strain to lie on the bed, play some music, and let the weed takeover. I was stoned! I haven't been this high since the days where I first began smoking. Overall 5/5 excellent strain”

“This is a very cerebral strain as I’m currently writing this review on it. 

I’m very sharp mentally on this strain compared to others.”
“This is All Right with me. Need to stay focused and get stuff done, grab this one.”

“This is my favorite afternoon concentrate to vape. I enjoy the mild mind & body high of this strain. Best for just chilling with friends while listening to music or watching sports or a movie while tossing a few drinks back. The body high is relaxing without the couch lock/sleepiness & the mind is euphoric without the excessive energy boost of other power sativa's or hybrids.”

“This is a very cerebral strain as I’m currently writing this review on it. 

I’m very sharp mentally on this strain compared to others.”
“Great strain!! Very uplifting! Short high, but no come down affects. Great smell”

“For me it feels harsh on my throat and chest. I feel like it's a very dry smoke. An it almost has the after taste of overcooked lobster. It doesn't help my pain or ability to fall asleep which is 2 of 3 reasons I smoke. But it does have a calming effect that helps my anxiety. I will not get this strand in the future.”
“Great cross! Super head high happy and uplifting but also very relaxing!!”
“Makes you really happy doe.”
“Good for day & night time”
“Great strain!! Very uplifting! Short high, but no come down affects. Great smell”
“Beautiful house bud!”

“For me it feels harsh on my throat and chest. I feel like it's a very dry smoke. An it almost has the after taste of overcooked lobster. It doesn't help my pain or ability to fall asleep which is 2 of 3 reasons I smoke. But it does have a calming effect that helps my anxiety. I will not get this strand in the future.”
“Great cross! Super head high happy and uplifting but also very relaxing!!”
“Makes you really happy doe.”
“Good for day & night time”
“awesome strained i have on deck now.its wonderful”
“solid”

“Very nice cerebral high, dream-like as the name suggests.  Thoughts ran away and concentration is a no go. Sleepy effects. Great for pain and spasms- I'm lifting weights and hurt back. Tastes great using vape. Hungry Hungry Hippo! (I was eating everything in sight- killed the cereal)”

“I usually only smoke to relax and have a good time, and picking dream queen was a perfect choice. Smoked it on a beach with some good friends and all I wanted to do was watch the waves and chill. Great earthy flavor/smell and crisp smoke out a blunt/joint. 4.5/5”
“Good taste sweet and peppery”
“I got it in shatter form and I have to say I enjoyed it Its very relaxing”

“I really like this plant a lot. Smoked a blunt of it and had a very nice long talkative high. Great social strain that keeps you feeling lifted for a while. Decent arousing affects as well but you have to be headed in that direction.”
“Very tasty and gives a strong body effect for pain”
“Beautiful light color buds with a spicy scent and a sweet taste it's a wonderful blend producing a cerebral high.”

“Great for a quick mental change into positivity; just the right amount of a sedative to numb minor body aches and calming to maintain through a tough workout. Love it, my go to when in doubt at the moment!”
“made me cough lots. nice smell, not too stanky though. good sized dense buds that grind up nicely. happy face high that also locked me to my couch. i slept great after i smoked it.”
“great head high.”
“nice smooth and tasty, lasting effects with little peaks here and there”
“Very nice calming and relaxed high. BEERY  favorable, With a hint of pungent, very good cross breed,definitely smoking it again”

“Best of both worlds of Sativa and Indica. I really dislike Sativa,and Indica just doesn't do enough for me. So what's the answer? Dream Queen! Music sounds incredible.and food tastes amaaazing! You are in a beautiful relaxed dream state.None of the downsides of either strain.More head buzz maybe,but think Indica on the brain,All negative side effects of Sativa are minimized.Of course everybody is different.This is ev...”

“What i love most about this strain is the smell and the taste. It has a nice unmistakable berry scent, as well as a light berry taste. Nice sativa affects although i did find myself a little tired after a while. Not as strong as i hoped for, in terms of my high, but its a good socializing strain, definitely made me more calm good enough to sit down and have a convo for hours.”
“🔥 love it”

column3: “smooth slow burn”

“Lifts your mood but gets you stoned at the same time. One of my favorites”

“This is my favourite sativa strain. It is so much lighter and euphoric yet allows me to and let me get on with my day!”

“This is an amazing strain with exceptional quality such as taste, density, and smoke. You won't find many strains that deliver as much as this one does. If there was a Ganja Hall of Fame; this strain would be inducted the first year.”

“Takes a while to feel affects, gives a nice head high and mellow body high. Makes you hungry and tired. Definitely a new fav”

“Good. Heady. Stoney. Buzzy. Won't pull your feet off the floor when you come.”
